name: beta-amyrin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (hydroxylating)
definition: beta-Amyrin + 2 [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 Oxygen <=> 11-Oxo-beta-amyrin + 3 H2O + 2 [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]
